tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE   The Aurora mostly occur in which layer of the earth’s atmosphere?
bonus_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE   Petroleum is generally found in
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Folded marine sedimentary rocks
X) Igneous intrusions into sedimentary strata
Y) Alluvial deposits of river valleys
Z) Old Fold Mountains
bonus_answer: ANSWER: W) FOLDED MARINE SEDIMENTARY ROCKS
